execution_plan.description: Find product_ids that have been ordered two or more times (products with >= 2 order items).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve id, name, price and color for products that have NOT been ordered at least twice (i.e., exclude product_ids returned by step 1). This will include products with zero or one orders.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_color FROM Products WHERE product_id NOT IN ($step1.product_id);
